rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0001
rows.name:
The path to the Sanctus Chain
is quite treacherous.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0002
rows.name:
This royal capital, Teos Aure, is
far above the Genbu Great Snowfield.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0003
rows.name:
When ya leave the palace and head down
to the left, you'll find the
ruins of Theospisti Temple.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0004
rows.name: There are ruins inside city?

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0005
rows.name:
Yep, that's right.
They're basically falling apart!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0006
rows.name:
Past that is the Teos Aure back gate,
and that's where we'll head outside...

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0007
rows.name:
After that, we'll need to follow the
pillars and keep heading down and down.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0008
rows.name:
Ugh...
That sounds really tough.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0009
rows.name:
But we must hurry-hurry!
Let's get to Genbu Snowfield right away!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0010
rows.name: Hold on, I ain't finished explaining yet.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0011
rows.name:
Once we get to the Genbu Snowfield,
we'll need to cross right through it.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0012
rows.name:
That gets us to a place called the
Great Pillar Passage. The Sanctus
Chain's at the end of that.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0013
rows.name:
Tora feel tired already just
from hearing how far it is...

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0014
rows.name: Masterpon, that's too soon!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0015
rows.name: Tora, this is no time for jokes.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0016
rows.name:
It's to protect Zeke's homeland.
Let's do our best.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0017
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0018
rows.name: Yes, let's do our best!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0019
rows.name:
Yeah!
Thanks everyone,
I'm really counting on ya!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0020
rows.name:
So first, we head out from
here and go left, got it?

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0021
rows.name: Tora remember just fine!
